projectGridLines.title: Designing and developing the front-end interface of AltiusHub’s compliance product
projectGridLines.description:
Description: The intern will be expected to work on active front-end development of AltiusHub’s products.

Skill sets: Should know React js, Python, and typescript

Traits expectation: Should have a good work ethic, and openness to work hard and learn

Expected learning: The intern will learn how enterprise grade products get built

Specific courses required for project execution: We expect that BITS will fill this.

projectGridLines.title: Designing and developing the back-end database of AltiusHub’s compliance product
projectGridLines.description:
Description: The intern will be expected to work on optimizing the database for AltiusHub’s products.

Skill sets: Should know how to work with document based databases such as Mongo / Cassandra, SQL knowledge is a good-to-have

Traits expectation: Should have a good work ethic, and openness to work hard and learn

Expected learning: The intern will learn how enterprise grade products get built

Specific courses required for project execution: We expect that BITS will fill this.

projectGridLines.title: Developing product documentation and on-boarding documents of AltiusHub’s various products
projectGridLines.description:
Description: The intern will be expected to work with AltiusHub’s product team to develop product documentation and on-boarding videos

Skill sets: Should have a knowledge of how SaaS products work, and good language skills

Traits expectation: Should have a good work ethic, and openness to work hard and learn

Expected learning: The intern will learn how enterprise grade products get built

Specific courses required for project execution: We expect that BITS will fill this.
